name: Tonigh I am Drunk
description:
This game is made by Yijia Guo, Radhika Sekhsaria, and Issac. 

You're a drunk, waddling around the streets. But luckily you remembered that you had a home to return to instead of bedmates with street rats. On the way home, you have to be careful of traffic and strange crowds, don't be hurt by them. At the same time, let's take a look at this fantastic and chaotic street.

W/A/S/D to move;

ESC to quit;

R to restart
